body_html:
this is expected behavior. You are creating a fresh nn.Linear on every forward call.

What you probably want is to define your weights as nn.Parameter in __init__ and then use F.linear, where F is torch.nn.functional. http://pytorch.org/docs/nn.html#torch.nn.functional.linear

Here's an example: https://github.com/szagoruyko/attention-transfer/blob/master/imagenet.py#L149

In the future, questions go to: https://discuss.pytorch.org

body:
this is expected behavior. You are creating a fresh `nn.Linear` on every forward call.

What you probably want is to define your weights as `nn.Parameter` in `__init__` and then use `F.linear`, where F is `torch.nn.functional`. http://pytorch.org/docs/nn.html#torch.nn.functional.linear

Here's an example: https://github.com/szagoruyko/attention-transfer/blob/master/imagenet.py#L149

In the future, questions go to: https://discuss.pytorch.org
